On.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death Instant
AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death Instant
AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death Instant
AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death Instant

On.Terms: StatusSet.*.NexusOvercharge; IsStatus NexusOvercharge 0; Option Model Low
StatusSet.*.NexusOvercharge; IsStatus NexusOvercharge 1; Option Model Low

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Work Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End 0 1.750000 AsTimeScale

On.Terms: AbilMorph.*.Finish; MorphTo Zergling; MorphFrom BanelingCocoon; !AbilKey BurrowUp
AbilMorph.*.Finish; MorphFrom Zergling; MorphTo BanelingCocoon; !AbilKey BurrowDown
